title: Looking for a mentor/guide
body:
Hey,
I'm looking for a generous mid-high ranking player to guide and help me to improve enough in normals that I can eventually play some ranked games.
I'm trying to read and watch advice posted in other places but I think I would improve a lot more with someone telling me specifically what I'm doing wrong.
I've played on and off for since the end of season 3 but in all of that time I've never played a ranked game and I've barely played normals (under 200 total).
If you're up for it you can add or message me in client under: See Me Fail

Thanks to anyone that bothered to read this and especially to anyone that wants to help me out.

replies.body:
I would say I can do stuff like this.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7XPrqvD8Lfo&list=PLyCEt27AsZuvNu0RQiCwgV2j3tR4foqvI

But I dont want to see you fail...
huehuehueheuheuheuheuheuehuehue ok im sorry :(
Lol, this game still haunts me in the dark passages of the internet... :P
LOL XD sorry its just the first one on the list of the playlist, so when I link it thats what it shows XD
Ah true that, I didn't realise it was a link for the playlist. :)
I'm a mid-ranked player that'll help if you want. Add this account if you want and I'll probably be on it sometime soon.

Hi. I am currently in bronze 2 and I am willing to help you climb and gain elo. Feel free to add me in game for advice/coaching/help.

- pu55y d3stroy3r
